articles.description: Listen to 5 Live commentary and follow live text as West Ham face Arsenal and Aston Villa play Manchester United in the Premier League.
articles.title: Premier League: Build-up to West Ham v Arsenal before Aston Villa v Man Utd

articles.description: Arsenal secure their biggest Premier League away win with a ruthless dismantling of West Ham to move back to within two points of leaders Liverpool.
articles.title: Arsenal thrash West Ham in their biggest PL away win

articles.description: Follow live text and BBC radio commentary as Ireland host Italy in the 2024 Six Nations at the Aviva Stadium in Dublin.
articles.title: Six Nations 2024: Build-up to Ireland v Italy

articles.description: Watch live coverage as Arsenal host Man City plus radio commentary and live text updates from five other games in the Women's FA Cup fifth round.
articles.title: Women's FA Cup: Arsenal host Man City in first of six games - watch live

articles.description: All you need to know about Super Bowl 58 as the San Francisco 49ers face the Kansas City Chiefs in Las Vegas for the NFL championship.
articles.title: Super Bowl 2024: Chiefs v 49ers - UK start time, half-time show, how to follow on BBC & will Taylor Swift be there?

articles.description: England spinner Jack Leach is ruled out of the remainder of the Test tour of India with a knee injury.
articles.title: England's Leach out of rest of India Test series

articles.description: Ivory Coast face fellow former champions Nigeria in the Africa Cup of Nations final in Abidjan after a remarkable run on home soil.
articles.title: Afcon 2023: Grand finale awaits between hosts Ivory Coast and Nigeria

articles.description: England do not live up to their pledge to entertain the Twickenham faithful but they have won their opening two games and are where they would have wanted to be, says Matt Dawson.
articles.title: 'Underwhelming England fail to entertain but are two from two'

articles.description: Jude Bellingham is set to miss Real Madrid's Champions League last-16 first leg against RB Leipzig on Tuesday with a sprained ankle.
articles.title: Injured Bellingham set to miss Leipzig tie

articles.description: Manchester City book their place in the Women's FA Cup quarter-finals at the expense of league rivals Arsenal in a damaging week for the Gunners.
articles.title: Man City beat Arsenal to reach Women's FA Cup last eight
